name: InstaCarma
tag_list: server-management, support, web-hosting, infrastructure-management, outsourcing, server-monitoring
overview:
InstaCarma provides server management and technical support services. Founded in 2003, the company is focused heavily on the web hosting industry. The company’s client base consists of several established web hosting companies and datacenters.

It is currently concentrating on the enterprise market across various verticals, apart from continuing its work in the web hosting industry. The company provides end to end infrastructure management services for enterprises and its diverse skill set provide it the ability to service all kinds of enterprises

The company provides services such as

  • Helpdesk/phone based support services
  • Proactive server management
  • Server monitoring
  • Remote infrastructure management
  • Server setup and provisioning
  • Application deployment and support
  • Virtualization services
  • High availability setups
  • Security services

InstaCarma is based out of Bangalore, India.
